channel.title: How to hold a MIDI note indefinitely?
channel.description:
hello collective mind,
please suggest me objects or solutions that would allow to hold a triggered MIDI note indefinitely. (i mean, without holding in on an input device).
thanks in advance.
**UPDATE:** well, i've managed to do it. actually, things did not work due to a wrong note range error in my patch.
